programme.title: O.J.Simpson, sports star
programme.short_synopsis: Sports star O.J.Simpson, the national black hero.
programme.medium_synopsis: The 20,000-to-1 chance of becoming a black sports star like O.J.Simpson.
programme.long_synopsis:
The 20,000-to-1 chance of becoming a black sports star like O.J.Simpson.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.
